state_analysis: PostgreSQL authentication is failing when trying to connect as the 'postgres' user. Since I'm running as root, I need to either connect as the postgres system user or modify the authentication settings. Let me try connecting as the postgres system user using 'su'.
explanation: I'll use 'su - postgres' to switch to the postgres user and then run the psql commands, or I can use 'sudo -u postgres' to execute commands as the postgres user.

commands.keystrokes: sudo -u postgres psql -d production_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;"
sudo -u postgres psql -d production_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions;"
